Verses: 1 saththamittuk Kooppidu; Adakkikkollaadhe; Ekkaalaththaippola Un Saththaththai Uyarththi, En Janaththukku Avargal Meerudhalaiyum, Yaakkobin Vamsaththaarukku Avargal Paavangalaiyum Therivi.

2 thangal Dhevanudaiya Nyaayaththaivittu Vilagaamal Needhiyai Seydhuvarugira Jaadhiyaaraippol Avargal Naadorum Ennaith Thedi, En Vazhigalai Ariya Virumbugiraargal; Needhi Nyaayangalai Ennidaththil Visaariththu Dhevanidaththil Sera Virumbugiraargal.

3 naangal Ubavaasampannumpodhu Neer Nokkaamalirukkiradhenna? Naangal Engal Aaththumaakkalai Odukkumpodhu Neer Adhai Ariyaamalirukkiradhenna Engiraargal; Idho, Neengal Ubavaasikkum Naalile Ungal Ichchaiyinpadi Nadandhu, Ungal Velaigalaiyellaam Kattaayamaai Seygireergal.

4 idho, Vazhakkukkum Vaadhukkum Dhushtaththanaththaiyudaiya Kaiyinaal Kuththugiradharkum Ubavaasikkireergal; Neengal Ungal Kookkuralai Uyaraththile Ketkappannumpadiyaai, Innaalil Ubavaasikkiradhupol Ubavaasiyaadhirungal

5 manushan Than Aaththumaavai Odukkugiradhum, Thalaivanangi Naanalaippol Rattilum Saambalilum Paduththukkollugiradhum, Enakkup Piriyamaana Ubavaasa Naalaayirukkumo Idhaiyaa Ubavaasamendrum Karththarukkup Piriyamaana Naalendrum Solluvaai?
6 akkiramaththin Kattugalai Avizhkkiradhum, Nugaththadiyin Pinaiyalgalai Negizhkkiradhum, Nerukkappattirukkiravargalai Vidudhalaiyaakkividugiradhum, Sagala Nugaththadigalaiyum Udaiththuppodugiradhum,

7 pasiyullavanukku Un Aagaaraththaip Pagirndhukodukkiradhum, Thuraththunda Sirumaiyaanavargalai Veettile Serththukkollugiradhum, Vasthiramillaadhavanaikkandaal Avanukku Vasthiran Kodukkiradhum, Un Maamsamaanavanukku Unnai Olikkaamalirukkiradhum Allavo Enakku Ugandha Ubavaasam.
8 appozhudhu Vidiyarkaala Veluppaippola Un Velichcham Ezhumbi Un Sugavaazhvu Seekkiraththil Thulirththu Un Needhi Unakku Munnaale Sellum;karththarudaiya Magimai Unnaip Pinnaale Kaakkum.

9 appozhudhu Nee Kooppiduvaai, Karththar Maruuththaravu Koduppaar; Nee Saththamiduvaai: Idho, Naan Irukkiren Endru Solluvaar. Nugaththadiyaiyum Viral Neettudhalaiyum, Nibachchollaiyum, Nee Un Naduvilirundhu Agatri,
10 pasiyullavanidaththil Un Aaththumaavai Saaiththu, Sirumaippatta Aaththumaavaith Thirupthiyaakkinaal, Appozhudhu Irulil Un Velichcham Udhiththu, Un Andhagaaram Maththiyaanaththaippolaagum.

11 karththar Niththamum Unnai Nadaththi, Magaa Varatchiyaana Kaalangalil Un Aaththumaavaith Thirupthiyaakki, Un Elumbugalai Ninamulladhaakkuvaar; Nee Neerppaaichchalaana Thottaththaippolavum, Vatraadha Neerootraippolavum Iruppaai.

12 unnidaththilirundhu Thondrinavargal Poorvamudhal Paazhaaik Kidandha Sthalangalaik Kattuvaargal; Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Irukkum Asthibaarangalmel Nee Kattuvaai; Thirappaanadhai Adaikkiravan Endrum, Kudiyirukkumpadi Paadhaigalaith Thiruththugiravan Endrum Nee Peyar Peruvaai.

13 en Parisuththanaalaagiya Oivunaalile Unakku Ishtamaanadhai Seyyaadhapadi, Un Kaalai Vilakki, Unvazhigalinpadi, Nadavaamalum, Unakku Ishtamaanadhai Seyyaamalum, Un Sondhappechchaip Pesaamalirundhu, Oivunaalai Manamagizhchchiyin Naalendrum, Karththarudaiya Parisuththa Naalai Magimaiyulla Naalendrum Solli, Adhai Magimaiyaaga Ennuvaayaanaal,

14 appozhudhu Karththaril Manamagizhchchiyaayiruppaai, Boomiyin Uyarndha Idangalil Unnai Eriyirukkumdi Panni, Un Thagappanaagiya Yaakkobudaiya Sudhandharaththaal Unnaip Poshippen; Karththarudaiya Vaai Idhai Sollitru.
